short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Subreddit Highlighter is the extension that highlights posts from subreddits of your chosing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you find yourself doomscrolling Reddit searching for some posts of your favorite subreddit or you simply would like to add some more color in your homepage this is the extension for you!

Choose what subreddits to highlight, pick what color to use and make your Reddit homepage unique.

-------------------------------

The code of this extension is fully open-source at https://github.com/DicyRoll/subreddit-highlighter
